title: Etc.: A Review of General Semantics

renewed-contributions.title: Danger, Men Talking
renewed-contributions.note: Noted as 'part 1' in renewal record. There is also a separate renewal for the drawings.

renewed-contributions.title: Danger, Men Talking (II)
renewed-contributions.note: Noted as 'part 2' in renewal record. There is also a separate renewal for the drawings.

renewed-contributions.title: Danger, Men Talking (III)
renewed-contributions.note: Noted as 'part 3' in renewal record, which also places it in the Autumn 1953 issue, but this appears to be an error. There is also a separate renewal for the drawings.

renewed-contributions.title: Danger, Men Talking (IV)
renewed-contributions.note: Title as given on item. Renewal record gives title as 'Danger, Men Talking. No. 4'.

renewed-contributions.note: Title as given in item. Renewal record gives title as 'Communication and Human Community.
